item.title: I-70 West/I-225 South Separation - Aurora
item.description: I-70 West/I-225 South Separation in Aurora. Merge left for (I-70) Exit 282 - I-225 South/Aurora/Colorado Springs. Merge right for ramp for I-70 west to Denver. Use far right lane for Peoria St.

item.title: I-70 West/I-225 South Split
item.description: I-70 West/I-225 South Split in Aurora, Colorado.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 282
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 282 - I-225 South/Aurora/Colorado Springs.

item.title: I-70 West - Exits 283 and 282
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 283 - Chambers Road. Approaching Exit 282 - I-225 South/Colorado Springs.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 285
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 285 - Airport Blvd. Use Exit 285 for access to Denver International Airport.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 286
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 286 - Tower Road.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 288
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 288 - BL-70/US-40/Colfax Ave. Exit 288 is a left exit; merge right to continue west on I-70 to Denver. US-40 leaves I-70 westbound here, and follows Colfax Ave. through Denver. US-40 rejoins I-70 near Golden. This is the eastern end of the Denver business loop.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 289
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 289 - E-470 Tollway/Colorado Springs/Fort Collins. E-470 is the tolled section of the beltway around Denver.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 287
item.description: I-70 West at E-470 Junction to Colorado Springs and Fort Collins. E-470 is part of the beltway around Denver. The eastern part of the beltway is tolled and is signed as E-470. The western part of the beltway is free and is signed as CO-470.
